name: EILF - Park Pack
detailed_description:
Add a new selfie game piece that removes guards while displaying one of 23 fullscreen images of an adult female elf (or two elves) at the park.

The Park Pack adds a new selfie game piece. The selfie game piece will appear randomly during normal gameplay. Click on the selfie game piece to remove two to three guards from the game board. It behaves the same as a weapon from the Weapon Pack DLC except it will also display a random image from this pack. Images supplement modern urban atmosphere.
about_the_game:

It behaves the same as a weapon from the Weapon Pack DLC except it will also display a random image from this pack. Images supplement modern urban atmosphere.
short_description: Add a new selfie game piece that removes guards while displaying one of 23 fullscreen images of an adult female elf (or two elves) at the park.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 fullscreen or any resolution windowed
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 128 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The DLC contains frequent images of adult female elves wearing swimsuits and sometimes posing in a sexy manner.
